title: Global defaults
description: This schema is to define the properties inside the global defaults config.

autoLayout.description: If set to `true`, [dagre](https://github.com/dagrejs/dagre) is used to automatically determine to positions of the nodes. Individually set positions will be overwritten see [Node positioning](https://github.com/KNowledgeOnWebScale/dataflow-visualization/tree/main#node-positioning) for more information.

orientation.description: The orientation of the graph. If you want to work from top to bottom or from bottom to top, set `orientation` to `vertical`

errorMessage.type: orientation must be string with possible values: vertical  or horizontal

fontsize.description: Size of the text inside the nodes.

errorMessage.type: shape must be string with possible values: 8-star , big-star , circle , cylinder , diamond , hexagon , note , rectangle , square , star , triangle , comunica , rmlio  or solid

stroke.description: The color of the stroke of the node.

strokeDasharray.description: The dash pattern of the node.

errorMessage.type: strokeDasharray must be number or string

strokeWidth.description: The thickness of the stroke of the nodes.

zIndex.description: Controls the stacking order of the nodes.

image.description: The image inside a node. This image takes up the entire width and height of the node.

strokeDasharray.description: The pattern of dashes of the edges. See [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/stroke-dasharray#example) for more information.

errorMessage.type: strokeDasharray must be number or string

animated.description: Set a default animation for the edge. See also [Animations](https://github.com/KNowledgeOnWebScale/dataflow-visualization/tree/main#animations).

animation.description: See [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/animation) for more information about animation.

type.description: Set how the edge should look like (straight line, curve ...). `default` = [BÃ©zier curve](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/B%C3%A9zier_curve).

errorMessage.type: type must be string with possible values: default , step , smoothstep  or straight

zIndex.description: Controls the stacking order of the edge. For more information, go to the [MDN Web Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/z-index).

label.description: Set the label of the edge.

sourceHandle.description: Set where the edge should attach to the source node.

errorMessage.type: sourceHandle must be string with possible values: left-source , right-source , top-source  or bottom-source

targetHandle.description: Set where the edge should attach to the target node.

errorMessage.type: targetHandle must be string with possible values: left-target , right-target , top-target  or bottom-target

type.errorMessage: Type of arrow must be string with possible values: arrow  or arrowclosed

orient.errorMessage: Orient of arrow must be number or string

color.errorMessage: Color of arrow must be string

type.errorMessage: Type of arrow must be string with possible values: arrow  or arrowclosed

orient.errorMessage: Orient of arrow must be number or string

color.errorMessage: Color of arrow must be string

errorMessage.type: Global settings are expected to be initialized in an object
